attributes.action: Close a fish Stall which has been given a license by Islington Council right outside a family business of decades Fresh Fish Shop OceanWave Fisheries N7 6AA
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are petitioning to close a stall which has just been granted a license outside a fish shop in Seven Sisters Road Holloway N7 6AA which has been a family business for decades, we are in a recession and local councils should be supporting local businesses not effecting our trade you will make employees unemployed and loose a valued community fish mongers who is well known and respected in the local area. PLEASE HELP US PETITION AND GET THIS CLOSED SUPPORT LOCAL BUSINESSES.

rejection.details: This is a matter for your local council
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
